column4: Hey there, me again. Wanted to ask a different question as well
This laptop is an Acer Aspire 5810TZ
The DVD drive on it is a TSSTcorp CDDVDW TS-U633A, and I can't get it to work
define 'get it to work'
In other words, I insert the DVD, it does not come up on screen
ah.. ive heard of that workaround before... hangon...
And even then it doesn't work
have you checked any messages when inserting a disc?  (tailf /var/log/messages0
one second, i want to try it'
run the command, then insert disc.
that produces a no such file/directory error
tailf /var/log/messages     ?
typo, I corrected later on :)
so anyway.   tried adding a line to fstab?  like  /dev/scd0 /media/cdrom iso9660,udf user,noauto 0 0
any errors or "wth" in your messages?
have you tried different discs, different formats ....
yes
errors?
just google the errors...
is this an upgrade from 9.10 ?
Waterfowl  hmm  what does sudo hdparm -I /dev/sr0    give
